required.message: Patient visit marked as unscheduled. Please provide the scheduled date.

questions.label: What is the patient's NHIF status?

questions.questionInfo: Indicate if the patient has another medical cover.

questions.label: Do you ever forget to take your medicines? (0=No, 1=Yes)

validators.message: Patient on ARVs. Please provide morisky adherence history.

questions.label: Are you sometimes not keen about taking your medications? (0=No, 1=Yes)

validators.message: Patient on ARVs. Please provide morisky adherence history.

questions.label: Do you stop taking medicine at times when you feel worse? (0=No, 1=Yes)

validators.message: Patient on ARVs. Please provide morisky adherence history.

questions.label: If you feel better, do you sometimes stop taking your medicine? (0=No, 1=Yes)

validators.message: Patient on ARVs. Please provide morisky adherence history.

calculate.calculateExpression: isNaN(parseFloat(feelBetter)+ parseFloat(feelWorse)+ parseFloat(notKeen)+ parseFloat(forget)) ? undefined: (parseFloat(feelBetter)+ parseFloat(feelWorse)+ parseFloat(notKeen)+ parseFloat(forget))

questions.label: Did you forget to take your medicine yesterday? (0=No, 1=Yes)

validators.message: Patient on ARVs. Please provide morisky adherence history.

questions.label: Do you sometimes stop taking medicine if you feel like your symptoms are under control? (0=No, 1=Yes)

validators.message: Patient on ARVs. Please provide morisky adherence history.

questions.label: Do you ever feel under pressure about sticking to your treatment plan? (0=No, 1=Yes)

validators.message: Patient on ARVs. Please provide morisky adherence history.

questions.label: How often do you have difficulty remembering to take all your medication? (0=Never/Rarely, 1/4=Once in a while, 1/2=Sometimes, 3/4=Usually,1=All the time)

validators.message: Patient on ARVs. Please provide morisky adherence history.

calculate.calculateExpression: isNaN(parseFloat(difficultyRemembering) + parseFloat(underPressure) + parseFloat(symptomControl)+ parseFloat(medicineYesterday)+ parseFloat(feelBetter)+ parseFloat(feelWorse)+ parseFloat(notKeen)+ parseFloat(forget)) ? undefined: (parseFloat(difficultyRemembering) + parseFloat(underPressure) + parseFloat(symptomControl)+ parseFloat(medicineYesterday)+ parseFloat(feelBetter)+ parseFloat(feelWorse)+ parseFloat(notKeen)+ parseFloat(forget))

parseInt(moriskyScore) === 0 && parseFloat(moriskyScore) <= 0.25 ? 'Good' : parseFloat(moriskyScore) >=0.5 && parseInt(moriskyScore) <= 2 ? 'Inadequate' : parseInt(moriskyScore) >= 3 && parseInt(moriskyScore) <= 8 ? 'Poor' : 'Unknown'

validators.message: Patient marked as on ART in ART History section. Therefore plan can only be drug substitution, continue regimen, change dose, chage regimen, change
Patient marked as not on ART in ART History section. Therefore plan can only be None,Start
You indicated patient is (re)starting ART. Please provide reason.
You indicated patient is not (re)starting ART, therefore no reason for starting should be selected.
You indicated patient is changing/changing dose/substituting/stopping arvs, reason for changing should be selected.
